sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { gsap } from 'gsap'; import GridMotion from '../components/GridMotion'; const AllSignage: React.FC = () => { const headingRef = useRef(null); const contentRef = useRef(null); const ctaRef = useRef(null); // Combine all signage images from different categories const signageImages = [ '/pavement-signs/pavement1.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting1.jpg', '/signboards/signboard1.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement2.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting2.jpg', '/signboards/signboard2.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement3.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting3.jpg', '/signboards/signboard3.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement4.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting4.jpg', '/signboards/signboard4.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement1.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting1.jpg', '/signboards/signboard1.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement2.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting2.jpg', '/signboards/signboard2.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement3.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting3.jpg', '/signboards/signboard3.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement4.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting4.jpg', '/signboards/signboard4.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement1.jpg', '/projecting-signs/projecting1.jpg', '/signboards/signboard1.jpg', '/pavement-signs/pavement2.jpg', ]; useEffect(() => { const tl = gsap.timeline({ defaults: { ease: 'power3.out' } }); tl.fromTo( headingRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 60, scale: 0.9 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, scale: 1, duration: 1.2, delay: 0.3 } ) .fromTo( contentRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 40 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 1 }, '-=0.7' ) .fromTo( ctaRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 30 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.9 }, '-=0.5' ); }, []); const services = [ { title: 'Pavement Signs', description: 'Eye-catching A-boards and pavement signage to attract foot traffic', link: '/services/pavement-signs' }, { title: 'Projecting Signs', description: 'Traditional and modern projecting signs for storefronts', link: '/services/projecting-signs' }, { title: 'Vehicle Signwriting', description: 'Professional vehicle graphics and livery for maximum brand exposure', link: '/services/vehicle-signwriting' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* GridMotion Background */}
{/* Dark Overlay */}
{/* Top Blur for Header */}
{/* Content */}
Complete Solutions

SIGNAGE
SERVICES

From traditional craftsmanship to cutting-edge digital solutions, we deliver signage that makes your business impossible to miss.

Bespoke design • Expert installation • Premium materials • Local service

Explore Services Get a Quote
{/* Bottom Vignette */}
{/* Services Grid */}

Our Specialties

{services.map((service, index) => (
0{index + 1}

{service.title}

{service.description}

Learn More
))}
{/* Why Choose Us */}

Why Choose Outpost Custom?

{[ 'Expert craftsmanship with over 20 years experience', 'Premium materials built to last in any weather', 'Full design service from concept to installation', 'Local knowledge, nationwide service' ].map((point, idx) => (

{point}

))}
20+
Years of Excellence
); }; export default AllSignage;
